metadata.title: CVE-2016-9859 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin. With a crafted request parametervalue it is possible to initiate a denial of service attack in importfeature. All 4.6.x versions (prior to 4.6.5), 4.4.x versions (prior to4.4.15.9), and 4.0.x versions (prior to 4.0.10.18) are affected.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9859` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.6.5.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.6.5.1-1').
